Description: Fragment from rim of pottery mortarium, with spool-shaped lug handle; fine sandy red clay; repair hole; drilled for analysis.
Curator's comments: Analysed by Hans Mommsen, Bonn, with NAA, Mommsen sample Nauk 105: NAA group Marl assoc.
Bibliographic references: Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (p.32 fig.4, p.42 no.26)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IA.39)
